channel.title: First on Michaela Cheong
channel.description: Recent content in First on Michaela Cheong

item.title: So, it began
item.description: I was trying to figure out how to make this website and what exactly it would hold and communicate to the rest of the billions of people with an internet connection. Not that I expect an audience, but once things are out in the world, they stay there. A blog seemed limiting, and I got caught up in a lot of websites recommending I choose a niche and stick to it.
